verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Rolled away, rolled away, newline I am happy since my burdens rolled away. newline Rolled away, rolled away, newline I am happy since my burdens rolled away.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I Remember when my burdens rolled away; newline I had carried them for years, night and day. newline When I sought the blessed Lord newline And I took Him at His word, newline Then at once all my burdens rolled away.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I remember when my burdens rolled away, newline That I feared would never leave night or day, newline Jesus showed to me the loss, newline So I left them at the Cross; newline I was glad when my burdens rolled away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I remember when my burdens rolled away, newline That had hindered me for years, newline Night and day. newline As I sought the throne of grace, newline Just a glimpse of Jesus' face, newline And I knew that my burdens newline Could not stay.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I am singing newline Since my burdens rolled away; newline There's a song within my heart newline Night and day. newline I am living for my King, newline And with joy I shout and sing, newline Hallelujah! newline All my burdens rolled away!
